item.title: MacBook Pro Touch Bar - Fix stuck keys
item.description: Those of you who rarely perform a full shutdown or reboot on your MacBook may occasionally encounter issues with the Touch Bar. One such issue is stuck//frozen keys. Unfortunately for me, my escape key happened to become stuck “on”, persistently spamming the escape keycode to the foremost application. This rendered many applications entirely useless, and stopped me even being able to access the Apple menu to perform power operations! Thankfully, there is a fix for this:
